about_the_game:
Tiny House Simulator Demo offers a hands-on experience in tiny home building and creativity. Complete a customer mission by crafting the perfect tiny house to meet specific needs, and test your skills in an auction mission where strategic building pays off.




Create Tiny Houses for Clients: Craft distinctive and inviting tiny homes on wheels. Personalize each home to showcase your clients' preferences and add your individual flair. Whether you're creating charming cabins or elegant minimalist houses, the possibilities are limitless!




Embark on an adventure across a vibrant and diverse island where every turn uncovers a new delight. Discover the vibrant town on the west coast, relax by the serene central lake, or venture towards the mountainous southeast.




Take control of your business development, design your tiny homes, and explore Tiny Island. The open-world gameplay offers infinite experiences customized to your personal style.




Connect your creations to your dependable vehicle and deliver them to satisfied clients around the island. Navigate through winding roads, scenic paths, and challenging terrains to meet your deadlines.




Oversee and expand your tiny house business. Invest your hard-earned money to upgrade your workshop, get a better vehicle, or try your luck at the local casino. Aim to construct even larger and more fascinating homes!




Enjoy the breathtaking views and attractions, including a fairground, windmills on the hills, and a lighthouse on a tiny isle. Unwind on the sandy beaches or explore the vibrant airport in the southwest.

Are you ready to take on the ultimate tiny house challenge? Start this exciting adventure and turn your small-scale dreams into a thriving business!
Get Tiny House Simulator on Steam today and begin creating your dream homes!

Tiny House Simulator Demo offers a hands-on experience in tiny home building and creativity. Complete a customer mission by crafting the perfect tiny house to meet specific needs, and test your skills in an auction mission where strategic building pays off.




Create Tiny Houses for Clients: Craft distinctive and inviting tiny homes on wheels. Personalize each home to showcase your clients' preferences and add your individual flair. Whether you're creating charming cabins or elegant minimalist houses, the possibilities are limitless!




Embark on an adventure across a vibrant and diverse island where every turn uncovers a new delight. Discover the vibrant town on the west coast, relax by the serene central lake, or venture towards the mountainous southeast.




Take control of your business development, design your tiny homes, and explore Tiny Island. The open-world gameplay offers infinite experiences customized to your personal style.




Connect your creations to your dependable vehicle and deliver them to satisfied clients around the island. Navigate through winding roads, scenic paths, and challenging terrains to meet your deadlines.




Oversee and expand your tiny house business. Invest your hard-earned money to upgrade your workshop, get a better vehicle, or try your luck at the local casino. Aim to construct even larger and more fascinating homes!




Enjoy the breathtaking views and attractions, including a fairground, windmills on the hills, and a lighthouse on a tiny isle. Unwind on the sandy beaches or explore the vibrant airport in the southwest.

Are you ready to take on the ultimate tiny house challenge? Start this exciting adventure and turn your small-scale dreams into a thriving business!
Get Tiny House Simulator on Steam today and begin creating your dream homes!

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel x64
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Tiny House Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1st gen / Intel Core i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3rd gen / Intel Core i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB / NVIDIA RTX 2070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Tiny House Simulator: Demo invites you to design and construct cozy, imaginative tiny homes in the first two missions. Build custom homes for clients, compete in an exciting auction, and explore the open world. Get a glimpse of the creativity and charm of the full game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Azerbaijani, Filipino, Hindi, Persian
